info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 10:40AM MST until August 13 at 11:30AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 1130 AM MST. * At 1039 AM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wild Cow Campground, or 12 miles southeast of Kingman, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Wild Cow Campground, Dw Ranch Road, Hualapai Mountain Park and Hualapai Peak. This includes the following roads... Interstate 40 in Arizona near mile marker 62. Highway 93 in Mohave County between mile markers 97 and 98. Hualapai Mountain Road between mile markers 7 and 12. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
